import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Footer, Navbar } from "../components"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const Checkout = () => { const state = useSelector((state) => state.handleCart); const [cartData, setCartData] = useState([]); // Fetch cart data from the backend on component load useEffect(() => { fetch("/checkout") .then((response) => response.json()) .then((data) => { console.log("Cart Data:", data); setCartData(data); }) .catch((error) => console.error("Error fetching cart data:", error)); }, []); const handleCheckout = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const orderDetails = { firstName: e.target.firstName.value, lastName: e.target.lastName.value, email: e.target.email.value, address: e.target.address.value, address2: e.target.address2.value, country: e.target.country.value, state: e.target.state.value, zip: e.target.zip.value, payment: { nameOnCard: e.target["cc-name"].value, cardNumber: e.target["cc-number"].value, expiration: e.target["cc-expiration"].value, cvv: e.target["cc-cvv"].value, }, cart: state, // Cart items from Redux }; fetch("/checkout", { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" }, body: JSON.stringify(orderDetails), }) .then((response) => response.json()) .then((data) => { alert(data.message); }) .catch((error) => console.error("Error submitting checkout:", error)); }; const EmptyCart = () => { return (

No item in Cart

Continue Shopping
); }; const ShowCheckout = () => { let subtotal = 0; let shipping = 10.0; let totalItems = 0; state.map((item) => { return (subtotal += item.price * item.qty); }); state.map((item) => { return (totalItems += item.qty); }); return ( <>
Order Summary
  • Products ({totalItems})RM{Math.round(subtotal)}
  • Shipping RM{shipping}
  • Total amount
    RM{Math.round(subtotal + shipping)}

); }; return ( <>

); }; export default Checkout;
